page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: THE PROJECT AREA IS GEOGRAPHICALLY {SITUATED IN THE TAMAR VALLEY,BETWEEN DARTMOOR TO THE EAST, IN DEVON, AND BODMIN MOOR, TO THE WEST IN MID_CORNWALL. IT IS{AN AREA OF GREAT {NATURAL BEAUTY,}WITH ROLLING HILLS AND VALLEYS MORE ASSOCIATED WITH DEVON AND CONTRASTING WITH THE MORE RUGGED LANDSCAPE OF THE MOORS. THIS IS EMPHASISED BY LARGE NUMBER OF TREES DECIDUOUS AND CONIFEROUS STILL TO BE FOUND IN COMPARISON WITH MUCH OF MID AND NORTH CORNWALL. REMINDERS OF THE {INDUSTRIAL PAST,}WHEN THIS WAS AN {IMPORTANT MINING DISTRICT}CAN READILY SEEN BY THE NUMBER OF OLD SHAFTS AND STACKS THROUGHOUT THE AREA. TODAY THE SCARS OF THE EXPLOITATION OF THE LAND ARE FADING AND ATTEMPTS TO RECLAIM THE MINING SITES ARE UNDER WAY. APART FROM SMALL SETTLEMENTS AND AREAS OF WOODLAND,{AGRICULTURE PREDOMINATES.
